document_data.name: Dweomerburst
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dweomerburst''''' was a [[spell]] that removed magical barriers.
document_data.Effects: When cast, all low- to mid-level magical barriers within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} of the caster exploded. A violent blast of magical energy was released as a result. Any creature within {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} was at risk of suffering damage and becoming stunned from the burst.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]]: a slim spindle. It was created specifically for this spell and was made from blown glass. During casting, the caster broke it.
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
